channel.title: Vista + Internet Question (Unresolved)
channel.description:
Hey everyone... Just got a vista... And I noticed that when im using uTorrent and I switch users to let someone else on it disconnects my internet so its stop seeding/download... Thats not really the big deal though cause when they reconnect it starts again... Where my problem comes in is if im trying to download a bigger file not a torrent and I switch users it wont reconnect so the file never gets completed... Can anyone help me out here? And saying something besides dont switch users lol
Shawrty

item.title: Vista + Internet Question (Unresolved)
item.dc:creator: @shawrty shawrty
item.description:
@shawrty wrote:

Either your being funny or you didnt read the whole post…

Shawrty
